Name: Hallermann-Streiff syndrome
Synonyms_List__c: Francois dyscephalic syndrome, Fran√ßois dyscephalic syndrome, Hallermann Streiff Francois syndrome, Hallermann Streiff syndrome, HSS, Oculomandibulofacial syndrome
Disease_Description__c: Hallermann-Streiff syndrome is characterized by a typical skull shape (brachycephaly with frontal bossing), hypotrichosis, microphthalmia, cataracts, beaked nose, micrognathia, skin atrophy, dental anomalies, and proportionate short stature (Hallermann, 1948; Streiff, 1950; Francois, 1958). Mental retardation is present in a minority of cases (Gorlin et al., 1990).
